title: Spicy Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Basmati rice, chicken pieces, yogurt, onions, tomatoes, garlic paste, ginger paste, green chilies, biryani masala (cinnamon, cloves, cardamom), coriander leaves, mint leaves, saffron soaked in milk, ghee, oil, salt
steps: Marinate Chicken: Mix chicken pieces with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, green chilies, biryani masala, and salt. Let it marinate for at least 1 hour. Prepare Rice: Wash basmati rice thoroughly. Boil water with salt and whole spices (cinnamon, cloves, cardamom). Add rice and cook until 70% done. Drain and set aside. Fry Onions: Thinly slice onions and fry in oil or ghee until golden brown. Remove half for garnishing. Cook Chicken: In the remaining oil, add marinated chicken and cook until tender and oil separates. Layering: In a heavy-bottomed pot, layer half the cooked rice, then the cooked chicken, sprinkle fried onions, chopped coriander and mint leaves, and saffron milk. Repeat with remaining rice and toppings. Dum Cooking: Cover the pot tightly with a lid or foil. Cook on low heat (dum) for 25-30 minutes to let flavors meld. Serve: Gently fluff the biryani and serve hot with raita or salad.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: Paneer cubes, butter, tomatoes, cream, cashew nuts, ginger paste, garlic paste, red chili powder, garam masala, kasuri methi (dried fenugreek leaves), sugar, salt
steps: Prepare Tomato Gravy: Boil tomatoes and cashew nuts, then blend into a smooth paste. Cook Base: Heat butter in a pan. Add ginger and garlic paste, sauté until fragrant. Add Tomato Paste: Pour in the tomato-cashew paste, cook for 5-7 minutes until oil separates. Spice it Up: Add red chili powder, garam masala, sugar, and salt. Mix well. Add Cream: Stir in cream and cook for another 2-3 minutes on low heat. Add Paneer: Add paneer cubes, coat gently with the gravy, cook for 5 minutes. Finish: Crush kasuri methi between your palms and sprinkle on top. Mix gently. Serve: Serve hot with naan, roti, or rice.

title: Vegetable Pulao
ingredients: Basmati rice, mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, beans, potatoes), onions, ginger paste, garlic paste, whole spices (bay leaf, cinnamon, cloves, cardamom), ghee, oil, green chilies, coriander leaves, salt
steps: Prep Rice: Wash basmati rice thoroughly and soak for 20-30 minutes. Cook Vegetables: Heat ghee and oil in a pan. Add whole spices (bay leaf, cinnamon, cloves, cardamom) and sauté until fragrant. Add chopped onions and sauté until translucent. Add Ginger-Garlic and Chilies: Add ginger and garlic paste along with slit green chilies. Cook for a minute. Add Vegetables: Add mixed vegetables and sauté for 3-4 minutes. Add Rice: Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pan. Stir gently to mix. Add Water and Salt: Add water (usually 1.5 to 2 times the quantity of rice) and salt to taste. Bring to a boil. Cook Rice: Cover with a lid and cook on low heat until rice is done and water is absorbed (about 15-20 minutes). Garnish and Serve: Fluff the rice gently with a fork. Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve hot.

title: Chole Bhature
ingredients: Chickpeas (soaked overnight), onions, tomatoes, ginger paste, garlic paste, green chilies, chole masala, cumin, coriander, amchur, garam masala, oil, salt, turmeric powder, red chili powder, asafoetida (hing), bay leaf, cinnamon stick, cloves, maida (refined flour), yogurt, baking powder, sugar, water (for dough and cooking), oil (for frying)
steps: Cook Chickpeas: Drain soaked chickpeas and pressure cook with water, salt, bay leaf, cinnamon stick, and cloves until soft. Prepare Chole Masala: Heat oil in a pan, add asafoetida, chopped onions, sauté until golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilies, cook till aroma fades. Add Tomatoes & Spices: Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, chole masala, cumin, coriander, amchur, garam masala. Cook until oil separates. Simmer Chickpeas: Add cooked chickpeas with cooking water, simmer for 15-20 minutes until thickened. Garnish with coriander leaves. Prepare Bhature Dough: Mix maida, sugar, salt, baking powder, yogurt, and water. Knead into soft dough. Rest 1-2 hours. Roll and Fry Bhature: Divide dough into balls, roll into circles, deep fry in hot oil until puffed and golden. Serve: Serve hot bhature with spicy chole.

title: Aloo Paratha
ingredients: Whole wheat flour, boiled potatoes, green chilies, coriander leaves, cumin powder, garam masala, salt, ghee or oil
steps: Prepare Dough: Mix whole wheat flour with water and a pinch of salt to make a soft dough. Rest for 15-20 minutes. Prepare Filling: Mash boiled potatoes. Add finely chopped green chilies, coriander leaves, cumin powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well. Stuff Paratha: Divide dough and potato filling into equal portions. Roll out a dough ball slightly, place filling in center, seal edges, and roll again into a flat circle. Cook Paratha: Heat a tawa or skillet. Cook rolled paratha on medium heat, applying ghee or oil on both sides until golden brown spots appear. Serve: Serve hot with yogurt, pickle, or butter.

title: Masala Dosa
ingredients: Dosa batter (fermented rice and urad dal), potatoes, mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chilies, ginger, onions, turmeric powder, salt, oil
steps: Prepare Potato Filling: Boil potatoes and mash them. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add Aromatics: Add curry leaves, chopped green chilies, grated ginger, and sliced onions. Sauté until onions are translucent. Spice the Filling: Add turmeric powder and salt. Mix in mashed potatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes. Set aside. Prepare Dosa: Heat a non-stick pan or tawa. Pour a ladle of dosa batter and spread thinly in a circular motion. Cook Dosa: Drizzle oil around edges. Cook until the dosa turns golden and crisp. Assemble: Place a spoonful of potato filling on one side of the dosa and fold. Serve: Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar.

title: Rajma Chawal
ingredients: Kidney beans (rajma) soaked overnight, onions, tomatoes, ginger paste, garlic paste, garam masala, cumin seeds, oil, salt, turmeric powder, red chili powder, rice
steps: Cook Rajma: Drain soaked kidney beans and pressure cook with water, salt, and turmeric until soft. Prepare Masala: Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter. Add chopped onions and sauté until golden. Add Ginger-Garlic: Add ginger and garlic paste, cook until raw smell disappears. Add Tomatoes & Spices: Add chopped tomatoes, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until oil separates. Combine Rajma & Masala: Add cooked rajma along with its water. Mix well and simmer for 15-20 minutes for flavors to blend. Cook Rice: Prepare plain steamed rice separately. Serve: Serve rajma hot with steamed rice (chawal).

title: Butter Chicken
ingredients: Chicken, butter, tomatoes, cream, ginger paste, garlic paste, kasuri methi (dried fenugreek leaves), red chili powder, garam masala, yogurt, oil, salt
steps: Marinate Chicken: Mix chicken pieces with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Marinate for at least 1 hour. Cook Chicken: Heat oil and a little butter in a pan. Cook the marinated chicken until almost done. Set aside. Prepare Tomato Gravy: In the same pan, add butter, ginger-garlic paste, and sauté until fragrant. Add pureed tomatoes and cook until oil separates. Add Spices: Add red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well. Combine Chicken and Gravy: Add cooked chicken to the gravy. Simmer for 10-15 minutes. Add Cream and Kasuri Methi: Stir in cream and crushed kasuri methi. Cook for another 5 minutes on low heat. Serve: Serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Palak Paneer
ingredients: Spinach (palak), paneer, onions, tomatoes, ginger paste, garlic paste, green chilies, cumin seeds, cream (optional), oil or ghee, salt
steps: Blanch Spinach: Boil water and blanch spinach leaves for 2-3 minutes. Drain and immediately transfer to cold water. Blend into a smooth puree. Prepare Masala: Heat oil or ghee in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter. Add finely chopped onions and sauté until golden. Add Ginger-Garlic: Add ginger and garlic paste, sauté until raw smell disappears. Add Tomatoes: Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft and oil separates. Add Spinach Puree: Pour in the spinach puree and mix well. Cook for 5-7 minutes. Add Paneer: Add paneer cubes and salt. Mix gently and cook for another 5 minutes. Add Cream (Optional): Stir in cream if using, and simmer for 2 minutes. Serve: Serve hot with roti or naan.

title: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: Chicken pieces, yogurt, ginger paste, garlic paste, red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, lemon juice, mustard oil (or any cooking oil), salt
steps: Prepare Marinade: In a bowl, mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, lemon juice, mustard oil, and salt. Marinate Chicken: Make slashes on chicken pieces and coat them thoroughly with the marinade. Let it marinate for at least 4 hours, preferably overnight. Preheat Oven/Grill: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F) or prepare a grill. Cook Chicken: Place marinated chicken on a baking tray or grill rack. Cook for 25-30 minutes, turning occasionally, until cooked through and slightly charred. Serve: Serve hot with sliced onions, lemon wedges, and green chutney.

title: Matar Paneer
ingredients: Green peas (matar), paneer cubes, onions, tomatoes, ginger paste, garlic paste, cumin seeds, garam masala, turmeric powder, red chili powder, oil, salt, coriander leaves
steps: Prepare Masala: Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter. Add finely chopped onions and sauté until golden. Add Ginger-Garlic: Add ginger and garlic paste; sauté until raw smell disappears. Add Tomatoes & Spices: Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until oil separates. Add Peas: Add green peas and a little water. Cook until peas are tender. Add Paneer: Add paneer cubes and garam masala. Mix gently and cook for 5-7 minutes. Garnish & Serve: Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve hot with roti or rice

title: Egg Curry
ingredients: Boiled eggs, onions, tomatoes, ginger paste, garlic paste, green chilies, turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, garam masala, oil, salt, fresh coriander leaves
steps: Prepare Masala: Heat oil in a pan. Add finely chopped onions and sauté until golden brown. Add Ginger-Garlic and Chilies: Add ginger paste, garlic paste, and chopped green chilies. Cook until raw smell disappears. Add Tomatoes & Spices: Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, and salt. Cook until oil separates. Add Water: Add some water to make a curry gravy and bring it to a boil. Add Eggs: Carefully add boiled eggs (whole or halved) to the gravy. Simmer for 5-10 minutes. Finish with Garam Masala: Sprinkle garam masala and mix gently. Garnish & Serve: Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Fish Fry
ingredients: Fish fillets, turmeric powder, red chili powder, garam masala, lemon juice, ginger paste, garlic paste, salt, rice flour (or cornflour), oil
steps: Marinate Fish: In a bowl, mix turmeric powder, red chili powder, garam masala, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, and salt. Coat the fish fillets thoroughly. Let marinate for 30 minutes. Coat Fish: Lightly dust the marinated fish with rice flour or cornflour for a crispy coating. Heat Oil: Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Fry Fish: Fry the fish fillets until golden brown and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes on each side. Drain & Serve: Drain excess oil on paper towels and serve hot with lemon wedges and chutney.

title: Sambar
ingredients: Toor dal (pigeon peas), tamarind pulp, mixed vegetables (drumstick, carrot, pumpkin, eggplant), mustard seeds, dried red chilies, curry leaves, sambar powder, turmeric powder, asafoetida (hing), mustard seeds, oil, salt, coriander leaves
steps: Cook Dal: Rinse toor dal and pressure cook with turmeric powder and water until soft and mushy. Prepare Tamarind Water: Soak tamarind in warm water and extract tamarind pulp. Cook Vegetables: In a pot, boil mixed vegetables with some salt until tender. Add Dal and Tamarind: Add cooked dal and tamarind pulp to the vegetables. Mix well and simmer. Add Sambar Powder: Add sambar powder and salt. Cook for 5-10 minutes on low heat. Prepare Tempering: Heat oil in a small pan. Add mustard seeds, dried red chilies, asafoetida, and curry leaves. When mustard seeds splutter, pour tempering over the sambar. Garnish & Serve: Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve hot with rice or idli.

title: Idli
ingredients: Parboiled rice, urad dal (split black gram), fenugreek seeds, salt, water
steps: Soak: Soak parboiled rice and urad dal with fenugreek seeds separately for 4-6 hours. Grind: Grind urad dal and fenugreek seeds into a smooth batter, then grind rice coarsely. Mix both batters together. Ferment: Add salt and ferment the batter overnight or 8-12 hours until it doubles in size. Prepare Idli Molds: Grease idli molds lightly. Steam: Pour batter into molds and steam in an idli steamer or pressure cooker (without whistle) for 10-15 minutes. Serve: Remove idlis from molds and serve hot with chutney and sambar.

title: Dhokla
ingredients: Gram flour (besan), yogurt, water, lemon juice, sugar, ginger green chili paste, eno fruit salt (or baking soda), mustard seeds, curry leaves, green chilies, oil, salt, coriander leaves
steps: Prepare Batter: In a bowl, mix gram flour, yogurt, water, lemon juice, sugar, ginger-green chili paste, and salt into a smooth batter. Add Eno: Just before steaming, add eno fruit salt to the batter and gently mix. The batter will become frothy. Steam: Pour batter into a greased steaming dish and steam for 15-20 minutes until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Prepare Tempering: Heat oil in a small pan. Add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and slit green chilies. Let mustard seeds splutter. Add Tempering: Pour the tempering over the steamed dhokla. Garnish & Serve: Garnish with chopped coriander leaves. Cut into pieces and serve with green chutney or tamarind chutney.

title: Kadai Paneer
ingredients: Paneer, onions, tomatoes, bell peppers (capsicum), ginger paste, garlic paste, green chilies, coriander seeds, cumin seeds, garam masala, turmeric powder, red chili powder, oil, salt, fresh coriander leaves
steps: Roast and Grind Spices: Dry roast coriander seeds and cumin seeds until fragrant. Grind coarsely and set aside. Prepare Masala: Heat oil in a pan. Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown. Add Ginger-Garlic and Chilies: Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilies, sauté until raw smell disappears. Add Tomatoes and Spices: Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, salt, and the freshly ground coriander-cumin powder. Cook until oil separates. Add Bell Peppers: Add sliced bell peppers and cook for 3-4 minutes, keeping them crunchy. Add Paneer: Add paneer cubes and garam masala. Mix gently and cook for 5 minutes. Garnish & Serve: Garnish with fresh coriander leaves. Serve hot with roti or naan.

title: Dal Makhani
ingredients: Whole black urad dal, rajma (kidney beans), butter, cream, ginger, garlic, onions, tomatoes, garam masala, cumin seeds, red chili powder, turmeric powder, salt, oil, coriander leaves
steps: Soak Dal and Rajma: Soak whole black urad dal and rajma overnight. Cook Dal and Rajma: Pressure cook soaked dals with water until soft. Prepare Masala: Heat oil and butter in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter. Add finely chopped onions and sauté until golden. Add Ginger-Garlic: Add ginger and garlic paste, sauté until fragrant. Add Tomatoes and Spices: Add pureed tomatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, salt, and garam masala. Cook until oil separates. Add Cooked Dal: Add cooked dal and rajma along with some cooking water. Simmer on low heat for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally. Finish with Butter and Cream: Add butter and cream, mix well, and cook for another 5 minutes. Garnish & Serve: Garnish with fresh coriander leaves. Serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Veg Fried Rice
ingredients: Cooked rice, mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, bell peppers, beans), garlic, ginger, soy sauce, spring onions, oil, salt, pepper
steps: Prepare Vegetables: Heat oil in a wok or pan. Add minced garlic and ginger, sauté until fragrant. Cook Vegetables: Add chopped mixed vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp. Add Rice: Add cooked rice to the vegetables. Mix well and break any lumps. Season: Add soy sauce, salt, and pepper. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes on high heat. Garnish: Add chopped spring onions and mix well. Serve: Serve hot as a main dish or side.

title: Hakka Noodles
ingredients: Noodles, mixed vegetables (carrots, cabbage, bell peppers, spring onions), garlic, soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, oil, salt, pepper
steps: Cook Noodles: Boil noodles according to package instructions. Drain and rinse with cold water to prevent sticking. Prepare Vegetables: Heat oil in a wok or pan. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. Stir-Fry Vegetables: Add chopped mixed vegetables and stir-fry on high heat until crisp-tender. Add Noodles: Add cooked noodles to the pan and toss well. Add Sauces and Seasoning: Add soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Mix thoroughly. Garnish: Add chopped spring onions and toss again. Serve: Serve hot.

title: Chicken Manchurian
ingredients: Chicken (boneless, cut into cubes), cornflour, all-purpose flour, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, chili sauce, green chilies, spring onions, vinegar, oil, salt, sugar, water
steps: Prepare Chicken: Marinate chicken cubes with salt, pepper, and a mix of cornflour and all-purpose flour. Set aside. Fry Chicken: Heat oil in a pan and deep fry the chicken pieces until golden and crispy. Drain on paper towels. Prepare Sauce: In a separate pan, heat oil. Add finely chopped garlic, ginger, green chilies, and spring onions. Sauté until fragrant. Add Sauces: Add soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, sugar, and a little water. Bring to a simmer. Combine: Add fried chicken pieces to the sauce and toss well to coat. Cook: Cook for 2-3 minutes until the sauce thickens. Serve: Garnish with chopped spring onions and serve hot with fried rice or noodles

title: Gobi Manchurian
ingredients: Cauliflower florets, cornflour, all-purpose flour, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, chili sauce, green chilies, spring onions, vinegar, oil, salt, sugar, water
steps: Prepare Cauliflower: Mix cauliflower florets with salt, cornflour, and all-purpose flour to coat evenly. Fry Cauliflower: Heat oil and deep fry the florets until crispy and golden. Drain on paper towels. Prepare Sauce: Heat oil in a pan. Add chopped garlic, ginger, green chilies, and spring onions. Sauté until fragrant. Add Sauces: Add soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, sugar, and a little water. Bring to a simmer. Combine: Add fried cauliflower to the sauce and toss well to coat. Cook: Cook for 2-3 minutes until sauce thickens. Serve: Garnish with chopped spring onions and serve hot as a snack or appetizer.

title: Spring Rolls
ingredients: Spring roll wrappers, mixed vegetables (cabbage, carrots, bell peppers, bean sprouts), garlic, ginger, soy sauce, chili sauce, oil, salt, pepper, cornstarch (for sealing)
steps: Prepare Filling: Heat oil in a pan. Add minced garlic and ginger, sauté until fragrant. Add finely chopped mixed vegetables and stir-fry until tender but still crisp. Season with soy sauce, salt, and pepper. Let cool. Assemble Rolls: Place a spring roll wrapper on a flat surface. Put a spoonful of filling near one corner. Fold sides and roll tightly, sealing the edge with cornstarch paste. Heat Oil: Heat oil in a deep frying pan for deep frying. Fry Rolls: Fry the spring rolls in hot oil until golden brown and crispy. Drain on paper towels. Serve: Serve hot with chili sauce or sweet and sour sauce.

title: Veg Momos
ingredients: All-purpose flour, water, mixed vegetables (cabbage, carrots, onions, mushrooms), garlic, ginger, soy sauce, salt, oil, black pepper
steps: Prepare Dough: Mix all-purpose flour with water and a pinch of salt to form a smooth, elastic dough. Cover and set aside. Prepare Filling: Finely chop or grate mixed vegetables. Heat oil in a pan, add minced garlic and ginger, sauté briefly. Add vegetables, soy sauce, salt, and pepper. Cook until vegetables are tender. Let cool. Shape Momos: Roll dough into small circles. Place a spoonful of filling in the center. Fold and seal the edges to form momos. Steam Momos: Steam momos in a steamer for 10-15 minutes until cooked. Serve: Serve hot with spicy chili sauce or tomato chutney.

title: Chicken Momos
ingredients: All-purpose flour, water, ground chicken, onions, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, salt, pepper, oil, spring onions
steps: Prepare Dough: Mix all-purpose flour with water and a pinch of salt to make a smooth dough. Cover and rest for 30 minutes. Prepare Filling: In a bowl, combine ground chicken, finely chopped onions, minced garlic, grated ginger, soy sauce, salt, pepper, and chopped spring onions. Mix well. Shape Momos: Roll dough into small circles. Place a spoonful of chicken filling in the center. Fold and seal the edges tightly to form momos. Steam Momos: Steam momos in a steamer for 12-15 minutes until cooked through. Serve: Serve hot with spicy chili sauce or tomato chutney.

title: Pasta Arrabiata
ingredients: Pasta (penne or your choice), olive oil, garlic, red chili flakes, tomatoes (fresh or canned), salt, black pepper, fresh parsley, basil (optional), grated Parmesan cheese (optional)
steps: Cook Pasta: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain and set aside. Prepare Sauce: Heat olive oil in a pan. Add minced garlic and red chili flakes; sauté until fragrant. Add Tomatoes: Add chopped tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Cook until tomatoes break down and form a sauce. Combine: Add cooked pasta to the sauce. Toss well to coat. Garnish & Serve: Garnish with chopped fresh parsley and basil. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese if desired. Serve hot.

title: Pasta Alfredo
ingredients: Fettuccine pasta, butter, heavy cream, garlic, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, black pepper, parsley (optional)
steps: Cook Pasta: Boil fettuccine pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain and keep some pasta water aside. Prepare Alfredo Sauce: In a pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté briefly. Add Cream: Pour in heavy cream and bring to a gentle simmer. Add Cheese: Stir in grated Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth. Combine: Add cooked pasta to the sauce. Toss to coat. If sauce is too thick, add reserved pasta water gradually. Season & Garnish: Season with salt and black pepper. Garnish with chopped parsley if desired. Serve: Serve immediately.

title: Mac and Cheese
ingredients: Macaroni pasta, butter, all-purpose flour, milk, cheddar cheese (grated), salt, black pepper, mustard powder (optional), breadcrumbs (optional)
steps: Cook Pasta: Boil macaroni pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain and set aside. Make Roux: In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add flour and whisk continuously to form a smooth paste (roux). Cook for 1-2 minutes. Add Milk: Gradually whisk in milk, stirring constantly until sauce thickens. Add Cheese: Remove from heat and stir in grated cheddar cheese until melted and smooth. Add mustard powder if using. Combine: Mix cooked pasta into the cheese sauce. Optional Bake: Transfer to a baking dish, top with breadcrumbs, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15-20 minutes until golden on top. Serve: Serve hot.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: Spaghetti, ground beef, onions, garlic, carrots, celery, tomatoes (canned or fresh), tomato paste, olive oil, red wine (optional), salt, pepper, Italian herbs (oregano, basil), Parmesan cheese (optional)
steps: Cook Spaghetti: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente. Drain and set aside. Prepare Sauce Base: Heat olive oil in a pan. Add finely chopped onions, carrots, and celery. Sauté until softened. Add Garlic and Beef: Add minced garlic and ground beef. Cook until beef is browned. Add Tomatoes and Herbs: Add chopped tomatoes, tomato paste, salt, pepper, and Italian herbs. Pour in red wine if using. Simmer for 30-45 minutes until thickened. Combine: Serve sauce over spaghetti. Garnish: Top with grated Parmesan cheese if desired.

title: Pizza Margherita
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, olive oil, salt
steps: Prepare Dough: Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired thickness. Add Sauce: Spread a thin layer of tomato sauce evenly over the dough. Add Cheese: Tear fresh mozzarella into pieces and scatter over the sauce. Bake: Bake in a preheated oven at 475°F (245°C) for 10-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly. Add Basil and Oil: Remove from oven, top with fresh basil leaves, and drizzle olive oil. Serve: Slice and serve hot.

title: Grilled Sandwich
ingredients: Bread slices, butter, cheese slices, tomatoes, cucumber, onions, lettuce, salt, pepper, mayonnaise or mustard (optional)
steps: Prepare Filling: Layer cheese, sliced tomatoes, cucumber, onions, and lettuce on a bread slice. Season with salt and pepper. Spread mayonnaise or mustard if desired. Assemble Sandwich: Cover with another bread slice. Spread butter on the outer sides of the sandwich. Grill: Heat a grill pan or sandwich maker. Grill the sandwich until golden brown and cheese melts, about 3-5 minutes per side. Serve: Cut diagonally and serve hot.

title: Cheese Burger
ingredients: Burger buns, ground beef patties, cheese slices, lettuce, tomato slices, onions, pickles, ketchup, mustard, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, oil
steps: Prepare Patties: Season ground beef with salt and pepper. Shape into patties. Cook Patties: Heat oil in a pan or grill. Cook patties until desired doneness. Add Cheese: Place cheese slice on patties during last minute of cooking to melt. Toast Buns: Lightly toast burger buns. Assemble Burger: Spread ketchup, mustard, and mayonnaise on buns. Add lettuce, tomato, onion slices, pickles, and cooked patties with melted cheese. Serve: Serve hot with fries or salad.

title: Veggie Wrap
ingredients: Tortilla wraps, mixed vegetables (lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers), hummus or cream cheese, avocado (optional), salt, pepper, olive oil, lemon juice
steps: Prepare Vegetables: Chop all vegetables into thin strips or bite-sized pieces. Make Dressing: Toss vegetables with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread Base: Spread hummus or cream cheese evenly over the tortilla wrap. Add Vegetables: Place the dressed vegetables and avocado slices on the tortilla. Wrap: Roll the tortilla tightly, folding the sides in as you go. Serve: Cut in half and serve immediately or wrap in foil for later.

title: Chicken Shawarma
ingredients: Chicken thighs (boneless), yogurt, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, ground cumin, ground coriander, paprika, turmeric, cinnamon, cayenne pepper, salt, pepper, pita bread, tahini sauce, cucumber, tomato, onions, lettuce
steps: Marinate Chicken: In a bowl, mix yogurt, minced garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin, coriander, paprika, turmeric, cinnamon, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper. Add chicken thighs and marinate for at least 2 hours or overnight. Cook Chicken: Grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until fully cooked and slightly charred. Prepare Wrap: Slice cooked chicken thinly. Warm pita bread. Assemble Shawarma: Place chicken slices in pita bread. Add sliced cucumber, tomato, onions, and lettuce. Drizzle with tahini sauce. Serve: Wrap and serve hot.

title: French Fries
ingredients: Potatoes, oil (for frying), salt
steps: Prepare Potatoes: Peel and cut potatoes into thin sticks. Soak: Soak potato sticks in cold water for 30 minutes to remove excess starch. Drain and pat dry. Heat Oil: Heat oil in a deep fryer or deep pan to 350°F (175°C). Fry Potatoes: Fry potatoes in batches until golden and crispy. Remove and drain on paper towels. Season: Sprinkle salt immediately while hot. Serve: Serve hot with ketchup or dip of choice.

title: Garlic Bread
ingredients: Baguette or Italian bread, butter, garlic, parsley, salt
steps: Prepare Garlic Butter: Soften butter and mix with minced garlic, chopped parsley, and a pinch of salt. Slice Bread: Cut the bread into slices, but not all the way through (leave the base intact). Apply Butter: Spread the garlic butter generously between the slices and on top of the bread. Bake: Wrap in foil and bake in a preheated oven at 350°F (175°C) for 15 minutes. Open the foil and bake for an additional 5 minutes for a crispy top. Serve: Serve warm as a side dish.

title: Omelette
ingredients: Eggs, salt, pepper, butter or oil, onions (optional), tomatoes (optional), bell peppers (optional), cheese (optional), herbs (optional)
steps: Beat Eggs: Crack eggs into a bowl, add salt and pepper, and whisk well. Prepare Filling (Optional): Chop onions, tomatoes, bell peppers, and herbs if using. Cook Vegetables: Heat butter or oil in a pan. Sauté vegetables until soft. Add Eggs: Pour beaten eggs over the vegetables in the pan. Cook Omelette: Cook on medium heat until eggs begin to set. Add cheese on top if desired. Fold and Serve: Fold omelette in half and cook for another minute. Serve hot.

title: Scrambled Eggs
ingredients: Eggs, salt, pepper, butter or oil, milk or cream (optional), herbs (optional)
steps: Beat Eggs: Crack eggs into a bowl, add salt, pepper, and a splash of milk or cream if using. Whisk well. Heat Pan: Melt butter or heat oil in a non-stick pan over medium-low heat. Cook Eggs: Pour eggs into the pan. Stir gently and continuously with a spatula to scramble the eggs. Cook to Preference: Cook until eggs are softly set and creamy, or longer if you prefer firmer eggs. Add Herbs and Serve: Stir in chopped herbs if desired and serve hot.

title: Pancakes
ingredients: All-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, milk, eggs, melted butter, vanilla extract (optional)
steps: Mix Dry Ingredients: In a bowl, combine flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt. Mix Wet Ingredients: In another bowl, whisk milk, eggs, melted butter, and vanilla extract. Combine: Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and mix until just combined (some lumps are okay). Cook Pancakes: Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat. Pour batter to form pancakes. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden. Serve: Serve hot with syrup, butter, or fruit.

title: Waffles
ingredients: All-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, eggs, milk, melted butter, vanilla extract (optional)
steps: Mix Dry Ingredients: In a bowl, combine flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt. Mix Wet Ingredients: In another bowl, whisk eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla extract. Combine: Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and mix until smooth. Preheat Waffle Iron: Preheat your waffle iron according to manufacturers instructions. Cook Waffles: Pour batter onto the waffle iron and cook until golden and crisp. Serve: Serve hot with syrup, butter, or fruit.

title: Mango Smoothie
ingredients: Ripe mangoes, yogurt or milk, honey or sugar (optional), ice cubes
steps: Prepare Mango: Peel and chop ripe mangoes into chunks. Blend Ingredients: In a blender, combine mango chunks, yogurt or milk, honey or sugar if using, and ice cubes. Blend Smooth: Blend until smooth and creamy. Serve: Pour into glasses and serve chilled.

title: Strawberry Milkshake
ingredients: Fresh strawberries, milk, vanilla ice cream, sugar or honey (optional), whipped cream (optional)
steps: Prepare Strawberries: Wash and hull fresh strawberries. Blend Ingredients: In a blender, combine strawberries, milk, vanilla ice cream, and sugar or honey if desired. Blend Smooth: Blend until creamy and smooth. Serve: Pour into glasses and top with whipped cream if desired. Serve chilled.

title: Banana Shake
ingredients: Ripe bananas, milk, honey or sugar (optional), ice cubes, vanilla extract (optional)
steps: Prepare Bananas: Peel and slice ripe bananas. Blend Ingredients: In a blender, combine banana slices, milk, honey or sugar if desired, ice cubes, and vanilla extract if using. Blend Smooth: Blend until creamy and smooth. Serve: Pour into glasses and serve chilled.

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: All-purpose flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt, sugar, eggs, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, boiling water
steps: Preheat Oven: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease and flour a cake pan. Mix Dry Ingredients: In a bowl, sift together flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and sugar. Add Wet Ingredients: Add eggs, milk, vegetable oil, and vanilla extract. Beat until smooth. Add Boiling Water: Gradually add boiling water and mix until batter is smooth (batter will be thin). Bake: Pour batter into the prepared pan. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Cool and Serve: Let cake cool before frosting or serving.

title: Vanilla Cupcake
ingredients: All-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, butter, eggs, milk, vanilla extract
steps: Preheat Oven: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a cupcake pan with paper liners. Mix Dry Ingredients: In a bowl, combine flour, baking powder, and salt. Cream Butter and Sugar: In another bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add Eggs and Vanilla: Beat in eggs one at a time, then add vanilla extract. Combine Wet and Dry: Add dry ingredients alternately with milk, mixing gently until combined. Fill Cupcake Liners: Pour batter into liners about 2/3 full. Bake: Bake for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Cool and Serve: Let cool before frosting or serving.

title: Brownies
ingredients: Unsweetened cocoa powder, all-purpose flour, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, salt, baking powder (optional), chocolate chips (optional)
steps: Preheat Oven: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease or line a baking pan with parchment paper. Melt Butter and Cocoa: In a saucepan or microwave, melt butter and cocoa powder together. Let cool slightly. Mix Wet Ingredients: In a bowl, beat eggs and sugar until combined. Add vanilla extract. Combine: Stir melted butter and cocoa mixture into eggs. Then add flour, salt, and baking powder (if using). Mix until just combined. Fold in chocolate chips if desired. Bake: Pour batter into the prepared pan and bake for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out with moist crumbs. Cool and Serve: Let cool before cutting into squares.

title: Gulab Jamun
ingredients: Milk powder, all-purpose flour, baking soda, milk, ghee or oil (for frying), sugar, water, cardamom pods, rose water (optional), saffron strands (optional)
steps: Prepare Sugar Syrup: In a saucepan, combine sugar and water. Heat until sugar dissolves. Add crushed cardamom pods, rose water, and saffron if using. Keep warm. Make Dough: In a bowl, mix milk powder, flour, and baking soda. Add milk little by little to form a soft dough. Shape Balls: Divide dough into small smooth balls without cracks. Fry: Heat ghee or oil on medium-low heat. Fry balls until golden brown, stirring gently to cook evenly. Soak: Remove fried balls and immediately soak in warm sugar syrup for at least 30 minutes. Serve: Serve warm or at room temperature.

title: Rasgulla
ingredients: Whole milk, lemon juice or vinegar, sugar, water, rose water (optional)
steps: Make Chhena (Paneer): Boil milk in a heavy pan. Add lemon juice or vinegar gradually to curdle the milk. Stir gently until curds form. Strain through cheesecloth and rinse with cold water. Squeeze out excess water and hang to drain for 30 minutes. Knead Chhena: Knead the chhena until smooth and soft. Shape Balls: Divide the chhena into small smooth balls without cracks. Prepare Sugar Syrup: Boil sugar and water to make syrup. Add rose water if desired. Cook Rasgullas: Drop balls into boiling sugar syrup. Cover and cook on medium heat for 15-20 minutes until they expand and become spongy. Cool and Serve: Let cool in syrup before serving chilled or at room temperature.

title: Kheer
ingredients: Basmati rice, whole milk, sugar, cardamom powder, saffron strands (optional), chopped nuts (almonds, cashews, pistachios), raisins (optional)
steps: Wash Rice: Rinse basmati rice under cold water until water runs clear. Boil Milk: In a heavy-bottomed pan, bring milk to a boil. Add Rice: Add washed rice to boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally. Cook: Cook until rice is soft and milk thickens, about 30-40 minutes. Add Sugar and Flavor: Stir in sugar, cardamom powder, and saffron strands if using. Cook for another 5 minutes. Add Nuts and Raisins: Garnish with chopped nuts and raisins. Serve: Serve warm or chilled.

title: Halwa
ingredients: Semolina (sooji/rava), ghee, sugar, water, milk, cardamom powder, chopped nuts (cashews, almonds, raisins)
steps: Heat Ghee: In a pan, heat ghee on medium heat. Roast Semolina: Add semolina and roast, stirring continuously until golden and aromatic. Boil Liquids: In another pan, bring water and milk to a boil. Add Liquids: Gradually add hot water and milk mixture to roasted semolina, stirring continuously to avoid lumps. Add Sugar and Flavor: Add sugar and cardamom powder. Cook until the mixture thickens and semolina is fully cooked. Add Nuts: Stir in chopped nuts and raisins. Serve: Serve warm.

title: Lassi
ingredients: Yogurt, water or milk, sugar, salt (optional), cardamom powder (optional), mint leaves (optional), ice cubes
steps: Blend Ingredients: In a blender, combine yogurt, water or milk, sugar, and ice cubes. Flavor (Optional): Add a pinch of salt for salted lassi or cardamom powder and mint leaves for flavored lassi. Blend Smooth: Blend until frothy and smooth. Serve: Pour into glasses and serve chilled.

title: Nimbu Pani
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice, water, sugar, salt, black salt (optional), roasted cumin powder (optional), mint leaves (optional), ice cubes
steps: Mix Lemon Juice and Water: In a pitcher, combine fresh lemon juice and water. Add Sweeteners and Spices: Add sugar, salt, black salt, and roasted cumin powder as desired. Stir: Mix well until sugar dissolves completely. Add Ice and Mint: Add ice cubes and garnish with mint leaves. Serve: Serve chilled.

title: Masala Chai
ingredients: Water, milk, black tea leaves, sugar, ginger, green cardamom pods, cinnamon stick, cloves, black peppercorns, star anise (optional)
steps: Crush Spices: Lightly crush cardamom pods, cinnamon stick, cloves, black peppercorns, and star anise if using. Boil Water with Spices: In a pot, bring water, crushed spices, and grated ginger to a boil. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add Tea Leaves: Add black tea leaves and boil for 2-3 minutes. Add Milk and Sugar: Add milk and sugar. Bring to a boil again and simmer for 3-5 minutes. Strain and Serve: Strain the chai into cups and serve hot.

title: Green Tea
ingredients: Green tea leaves or green tea bags, water, honey or lemon (optional)
steps: Boil Water: Bring water to a boil, then let it cool for a minute to about 80°C (176°F). Steep Tea: Add green tea leaves or tea bag to hot water. Steep for 2-3 minutes. Remove Leaves/Bag: Remove tea leaves or tea bag. Add Flavor (Optional): Add honey or lemon as desired. Serve: Serve hot.

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic, Butter, Olive oil, Vegetable broth, Salt, Black pepper, Sugar, Basil leaves, Cream (optional), Croutons (optional)
steps: Prepare ingredients: Wash and roughly chop the tomatoes. Peel and chop the onion and garlic. Sauté aromatics: In a pot, heat butter and olive oil. Add chopped onion and garlic. Sauté until soft and fragrant. Add tomatoes: Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they become soft (about 8-10 minutes). Season: Add salt, black pepper, a pinch of sugar, and a few basil leaves. Mix well. Add broth: Pour in vegetable broth. Simmer for 10-15 minutes to blend flavors. Blend: Use a hand blender (or let it cool and blend in a mixer) until smooth. Strain (optional): Strain the soup to remove seeds and skin for a smooth texture. Heat and finish: Reheat the soup. Add a little cream for richness, if desired. Serve: Pour into bowls. Garnish with basil, cream swirl, or croutons.

title: Sweet Corn Soup
ingredients: Sweet corn kernels, Corn flour, Water, Carrot, Cabbage, Spring onions, Ginger, Garlic, Salt, Black pepper, Soy sauce, Vinegar, Butter, Vegetable broth (optional)
steps: Prepare corn: Boil or steam sweet corn kernels. Blend half of them into a coarse paste; keep the rest whole. Sauté aromatics: In a pot, heat butter. Add finely chopped ginger and garlic. Sauté for a minute. Add vegetables: Add finely chopped carrot, cabbage, and spring onions. Sauté for 2-3 minutes. Add corn: Mix in both the corn paste and whole kernels. Add water/broth: Pour in water or vegetable broth. Bring to a boil. Season: Add salt, black pepper, a dash of soy sauce, and a few drops of vinegar. Thicken soup: Mix corn flour with water to make a slurry. Slowly add it to the soup while stirring to avoid lumps. Simmer: Cook for 5-7 minutes until the soup thickens slightly and vegetables are tender. Serve: Garnish with chopped spring onions. Serve hot.

title: Hot and Sour Soup
ingredients: Mushrooms, Carrot, Cabbage, Spring onions, Ginger, Garlic, Green chili (optional), Soy sauce, Vinegar, Chili sauce, Black pepper, Salt, Corn flour, Water, Vegetable broth, Tofu (optional), White pepper (optional), Sesame oil (optional)
steps: Prepare vegetables: Finely chop mushrooms, carrots, cabbage, ginger, garlic, and spring onions. Sauté aromatics: In a large pot, heat a bit of sesame oil or regular oil. Add ginger, garlic, and green chili (if using). Sauté for 1 minute. Add vegetables: Add the chopped vegetables (and tofu if using). Stir-fry for 23 minutes. Add liquids: Pour in vegetable broth or water. Bring to a boil. Season: Add soy sauce, vinegar, chili sauce, salt, black pepper, and white pepper (optional). Mix well. Thicken soup: In a small bowl, mix corn flour with water to form a slurry. Slowly add it to the soup, stirring constantly. Simmer: Let the soup simmer for 45 minutes until it thickens slightly. Finish: Taste and adjust spices. Add chopped spring onion greens just before turning off the heat. Serve: Serve hot, garnished with extra spring onions or a dash of chili oil if desired.

title: Manchow Soup
ingredients: Cabbage, Carrot, Capsicum, French beans, Spring onions, Garlic, Ginger, Green chili, Soy sauce, Vinegar, Red chili sauce, Black pepper, Salt, Corn flour, Water, Vegetable broth, Oil, Fried noodles (for garnish)
steps: Chop vegetables: Finely chop cabbage, carrot, capsicum, French beans, garlic, ginger, green chili, and spring onions. Sauté aromatics: In a large pot, heat oil. Add ginger, garlic, and green chili. Sauté for a minute until fragrant. Add vegetables: Add chopped vegetables and stir-fry on high flame for 23 minutes. Pour liquid: Add water or vegetable broth. Mix and bring to a boil. Add sauces and seasoning: Add soy sauce, vinegar, red chili sauce, black pepper, and salt. Mix well. Thicken the soup: Make a slurry by mixing corn flour with water. Slowly add to the soup while stirring continuously. Simmer: Let the soup simmer for 5 minutes until it thickens. Finish: Add chopped spring onion greens. Stir and turn off the heat. Serve: Pour into bowls and top with crispy fried noodles for that signature crunch.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, Croutons, Parmesan cheese, Egg yolk, Garlic, Dijon mustard, Lemon juice, Olive oil, Anchovy paste (optional), Worcestershire sauce, Salt, Black pepper
steps: Prepare lettuce: Wash and chop romaine lettuce. Pat dry and refrigerate to keep it crisp. Make dressing: In a bowl, whisk together egg yolk, minced garlic, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, anchovy paste (optional), and Worcestershire sauce. Add oil: Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking to emulsify into a creamy dressing. Season: Add salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste. Toss salad: In a large bowl, combine lettuce, croutons, and grated or shaved Parmesan cheese. Dress and mix: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss until well coated. Serve: Top with extra Parmesan and fresh black pepper. Serve immediately.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: Cucumber, Cherry tomatoes, Red onion, Kalamata olives, Feta cheese, Green bell pepper, Dried oregano, Olive oil, Red wine vinegar, Salt, Black pepper
steps: Chop vegetables: Dice cucumber, halve cherry tomatoes, thinly slice red onion, and chop green bell pepper. Combine base: In a large bowl, combine chopped vegetables with Kalamata olives. Add feta: Cut feta cheese into cubes or crumble it and add to the salad. Make dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper. Toss salad: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently. Serve: Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: Fruit Salad
ingredients: Apple, Banana, Orange, Grapes, Pineapple, Strawberry, Kiwi, Pomegranate seeds, Honey, Lemon juice, Mint leaves (optional), Chaat masala (optional for Indian twist)
steps: Wash and chop: Wash all fruits thoroughly. Peel and chop them into bite-sized pieces. Combine fruits: In a large bowl, mix all the chopped fruits. Add flavor: Drizzle with honey and a little lemon juice to enhance flavor and prevent browning. Optional spices: Add a pinch of chaat masala for a tangy Indian twist if desired. Mix and chill: Toss gently to combine. Refrigerate for 1530 minutes. Serve: Garnish with mint leaves before serving.

title: Chicken Salad
ingredients: Cooked chicken breast, Mayonnaise, Greek yogurt (optional), Celery, Red onion, Apple (optional), Lettuce, Salt, Black pepper, Lemon juice, Dijon mustard (optional), Parsley or coriander leaves
steps: Prepare chicken: Shred or dice cooked chicken breast into small pieces. Chop veggies: Finely chop celery, red onion, and apple (if using). Chop fresh parsley or coriander. Make dressing: In a bowl, mix mayonnaise, a spoon of Greek yogurt (optional), lemon juice, Dijon mustard (optional), salt, and black pepper. Combine ingredients: Add chopped vegetables and chicken to the dressing. Mix well to coat everything evenly. Chill: Refrigerate for 1530 minutes to enhance flavor. Serve: Serve over a bed of lettuce, in a sandwich, wrap, or on its own.

title: Mushroom Soup
ingredients: Mushrooms, Onion, Garlic, Butter, Olive oil, All-purpose flour, Milk, Cream (optional), Vegetable broth, Salt, Black pepper, Thyme (optional), Parsley (for garnish)
steps: Chop ingredients: Clean and slice mushrooms. Finely chop onion and garlic. Sauté aromatics: In a pot, heat butter and a little olive oil. Add chopped onion and garlic. Sauté until translucent. Cook mushrooms: Add mushrooms and cook until soft and browned (about 810 minutes). Add flour: Sprinkle flour over the mushrooms and mix well. Cook for 2 minutes to remove raw flavor. Pour liquids: Slowly add vegetable broth and stir to avoid lumps. Add milk and bring to a simmer. Season: Add salt, black pepper, and thyme (if using). Let it cook for 1015 minutes. Blend (optional): For a creamy texture, blend the soup partially or fully, then return to pot. Finish: Stir in cream (optional) and simmer for 2 more minutes. Serve: Garnish with chopped parsley and serve hot.

title: Pav Bhaji
ingredients: Potatoes, Tomatoes, Green peas, Cauliflower, Carrot, Capsicum (bell pepper), Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Butter, Pav bhaji masala, Red chili powder, Turmeric powder, Salt, Lemon, Fresh coriander leaves, Pav buns, Oil
steps: Boil vegetables: Boil potatoes, cauliflower, carrots, green peas until soft. Mash them well. Prepare masala: Finely chop onions, tomatoes, ginger, and garlic. Cook masala: In a pan, heat oil and butter. Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic until golden. Add tomatoes and spices: Add chopped tomatoes, pav bhaji masala, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until tomatoes are soft. Add mashed veggies: Add the mashed vegetables to the pan. Mix well. Cook bhaji: Add some water to adjust consistency. Simmer and cook for 1015 minutes, stirring frequently. Prepare pav: Heat butter on a skillet. Slice pav buns and toast them on the skillet until golden. Serve: Garnish bhaji with fresh coriander and a squeeze of lemon. Serve hot with toasted pav.

title: Vada Pav
ingredients: Potatoes, Green chili, Ginger, Garlic, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Turmeric powder, Salt, Gram flour (besan), Water, Oil (for frying), Pav buns, Green chutney, Tamarind chutney, Dry garlic chutney (optional)
steps: Boil potatoes: Boil and mash potatoes until smooth. Prepare tempering: Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, finely chopped green chili, ginger, and garlic. Sauté for a minute. Mix potatoes: Add turmeric powder and salt to the tempering. Mix mashed potatoes into the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes. Let the mixture cool. Make batter: Prepare a thick batter by mixing gram flour with water and a pinch of salt. Shape vadas: Make small balls from the potato mixture. Fry vadas: Dip potato balls into the batter, then deep fry in hot oil until golden and crispy. Prepare pav: Slice pav buns horizontally and lightly toast with butter on a pan. Assemble: Spread green chutney, tamarind chutney, and dry garlic chutney (optional) inside the pav. Place the fried vada inside. Serve: Serve hot with fried green chili or chutneys.

title: Misal Pav
ingredients: Sprouted moth beans (matki), Onion, Tomato, Green chili, Ginger, Garlic, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Turmeric powder, Red chili powder, Goda masala (or garam masala), Salt, Oil, Farsan (Indian snack mix), Fresh coriander leaves, Lemon, Pav buns
steps: Cook sprouts: Boil sprouted moth beans until soft but not mushy. Prepare tempering: Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds, curry leaves, chopped ginger, garlic, and green chili. Sauté until fragrant. Add onions and tomatoes: Add finely chopped onions and sauté until translucent. Then add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. Add spices: Mix in turmeric powder, red chili powder, goda masala, and salt. Cook sprouts in masala: Add boiled sprouts and some water to make a curry-like consistency. Simmer for 1015 minutes. Prepare pav: Lightly toast pav buns on a pan with butter. Serve: Pour the misal (sprouts curry) into bowls. Top with farsan, chopped coriander, and a squeeze of lemon. Serve hot with pav.

title: Poha
ingredients: Flattened rice (poha), Onion, Green chili, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Turmeric powder, Salt, Sugar, Lemon juice, Peanuts, Oil, Fresh coriander leaves
steps: Rinse poha: Rinse flattened rice in water gently and drain. Let it soften but not become mushy. Prepare tempering: Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add curry leaves, chopped green chili, and peanuts. Fry for a minute. Sauté onions: Add finely chopped onions and sauté until translucent. Add spices: Add turmeric powder, salt, and a pinch of sugar. Mix well. Add poha: Add the drained poha to the pan. Mix gently to coat with spices. Cook: Cover and cook on low heat for 2-3 minutes. Finish: Turn off heat. Add lemon juice and chopped coriander. Mix gently. Serve: Serve hot with optional sev or a side of yogurt.

title: Upma
ingredients: Semolina (rava), Mustard seeds, Urad dal, Chana dal, Green chili, Ginger, Curry leaves, Onion, Water, Salt, Oil or ghee, Fresh coriander leaves, Lemon juice (optional)
steps: Roast semolina: Dry roast semolina in a pan until it turns light golden and aromatic. Set aside. Prepare tempering: Heat oil or ghee in a pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add urad dal and chana dal, fry until golden. Add aromatics: Add chopped green chili, grated ginger, curry leaves, and finely chopped onion. Sauté until onions turn translucent. Add water: Pour water into the pan and bring it to a boil. Add salt. Cook semolina: Gradually add roasted semolina while stirring continuously to avoid lumps. Simmer: Cook on low heat until the semolina absorbs water and thickens. Finish: Turn off heat, add chopped coriander and lemon juice if using. Mix well. Serve: Serve hot with coconut chutney or pickle.

title: Khandvi
ingredients: Gram flour (besan), Yogurt, Turmeric powder, Ginger paste, Green chili paste, Salt, Water, Oil, Mustard seeds, Sesame seeds, Curry leaves, Fresh coriander leaves
steps: Make batter: In a bowl, mix gram flour, yogurt, turmeric powder, ginger paste, green chili paste, salt, and water until smooth with no lumps. Cook batter: Pour the batter into a non-stick pan and cook on medium heat, stirring continuously until it thickens and becomes like a dough. Spread batter: Quickly spread the cooked batter thinly and evenly on a greased flat surface or back of a tray. Roll khandvi: Once cooled, cut into strips and roll them tightly into bite-sized rolls. Prepare tempering: Heat oil in a small pan. Add mustard seeds, sesame seeds, and curry leaves. Let them splutter. Garnish: Pour the tempering over the khandvi rolls. Serve: Garnish with chopped fresh coriander leaves and serve at room temperature.

title: Sabudana Khichdi
ingredients: Sabudana (tapioca pearls), Peanuts, Green chili, Cumin seeds, Curry leaves, Potato, Ghee or oil, Salt, Sugar, Lemon juice, Fresh coriander leaves
steps: Soak sabudana: Rinse sabudana well and soak in water for 4-5 hours or overnight until they become soft. Roast peanuts: Dry roast peanuts until golden and let them cool. Coarsely crush the peanuts. Cook potatoes: Peel and dice potatoes. Prepare tempering: Heat ghee or oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and curry leaves. Let them splutter. Sauté: Add chopped green chili and diced potatoes. Cook until potatoes are soft. Add sabudana: Drain excess water from sabudana and add to the pan. Mix gently. Season: Add salt and a pinch of sugar. Cook on low heat, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking. Add peanuts: Mix in crushed roasted peanuts. Finish: Turn off heat, add lemon juice and chopped coriander leaves. Mix well. Serve: Serve hot with a side of yogurt or pickle.

title: Bread Pakora
ingredients: Bread slices, Potato, Green chili, Ginger, Coriander leaves, Gram flour (besan), Rice flour (optional), Carom seeds (ajwain), Turmeric powder, Red chili powder, Garam masala, Salt, Water, Oil (for frying)
steps: Prepare filling: Boil and mash potatoes. Add finely chopped green chili, ginger, coriander leaves, salt, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and garam masala. Mix well. Make batter: In a bowl, mix gram flour, rice flour (optional), carom seeds, salt, and water to make a thick, smooth batter. Assemble pakora: Take a bread slice, spread the potato filling evenly, and cover with another bread slice to make a sandwich. Press edges gently. Dip and fry: Dip the sandwich in the batter to coat fully. Deep fry in hot oil until golden and crispy on both sides. Drain: Remove and drain on paper towels. Serve: Serve hot with green chutney or tomato ketchup.

title: Samosa
ingredients: All-purpose flour, Ghee or oil, Water, Salt, Potato, Green peas, Green chili, Ginger, Cumin seeds, Coriander powder, Garam masala, Amchur powder (dry mango powder), Red chili powder, Mustard seeds, Oil (for frying), Fresh coriander leaves
steps: Make dough: Mix all-purpose flour, salt, and ghee/oil. Add water gradually and knead into a firm dough. Cover and set aside. Prepare filling: Boil and mash potatoes. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, chopped green chili, and ginger. Sauté. Cook filling: Add boiled peas, mashed potatoes, coriander powder, garam masala, amchur powder, red chili powder, and salt. Cook for 5 minutes. Mix in chopped coriander. Let it cool. Shape samosas: Divide dough into small balls. Roll each ball into an oval, cut in half. Form a cone from half, fill with potato mixture, seal edges with water. Fry samosas: Deep fry samosas in hot oil until golden and crispy. Drain and serve: Drain on paper towels. Serve hot with chutney or sauce.

title: Pakora
ingredients: Gram flour (besan), Onion, Potato, Spinach (optional), Green chili, Ginger, Coriander leaves, Carom seeds (ajwain), Red chili powder, Turmeric powder, Salt, Water, Oil (for frying)
steps: Prepare veggies: Thinly slice onions, potatoes, and spinach (if using). Chop green chili, ginger, and coriander leaves. Make batter: In a bowl, mix gram flour, carom seeds, red chili powder, turmeric powder, salt, and water to form a thick batter. Add veggies: Add sliced and chopped vegetables to the batter and mix well. Heat oil: Heat oil in a deep frying pan. Fry pakoras: Drop spoonfuls of the batter mixture into hot oil. Fry until golden and crispy. Drain: Remove pakoras and drain on paper towels. Serve: Serve hot with chutney or ketchup.

title: Stuffed Capsicum
ingredients: Capsicums (bell peppers), Potatoes, Onion, Green chili, Ginger, Garlic, Tomato, Coriander powder, Cumin powder, Garam masala, Turmeric powder, Red chili powder, Salt, Oil, Fresh coriander leaves
steps: Prepare capsicums: Wash capsicums and cut off the tops. Remove seeds and membranes carefully. Make stuffing: Boil and mash potatoes. In a pan, heat oil and sauté finely chopped onions, green chili, ginger, and garlic until golden. Add spices and tomato: Add chopped tomato, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until tomatoes are soft. Combine: Add mashed potatoes to the spice mixture. Mix well and cook for a few minutes. Stuff capsicums: Fill each capsicum with the potato stuffing. Cook capsicums: Place stuffed capsicums in a pan, cover, and cook on low heat until capsicums are tender. Garnish and serve: Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot.

title: Baingan Bharta
ingredients: Large eggplant (baingan), Onion, Tomato, Green chili, Garlic, Ginger, Mustard oil (or any cooking oil), Cumin seeds, Turmeric powder, Red chili powder, Salt, Fresh coriander leaves, Lemon juice (optional)
steps: Roast eggplant: Roast the eggplant over an open flame or in an oven until the skin is charred and the flesh is soft. Let it cool. Prepare eggplant: Peel off the charred skin and mash the soft flesh. Sauté aromatics: Heat oil in a pan. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter. Add finely chopped onions, garlic, ginger, and green chili. Sauté until golden brown. Add tomatoes and spices: Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until tomatoes are soft and oil separates. Add mashed eggplant: Mix in the mashed eggplant and cook for 5-7 minutes on medium heat. Finish: Add fresh coriander leaves and lemon juice if desired. Mix well. Serve: Serve hot with roti or rice.

title: Bhindi Fry
ingredients: Okra (bhindi), Oil, Mustard seeds, Turmeric powder, Red chili powder, Coriander powder, Cumin powder, Amchur powder (dry mango powder), Salt
steps: Prepare bhindi: Wash and dry okra thoroughly. Cut into 1-inch pieces. Heat oil: Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add bhindi: Add chopped okra to the pan. Add spices: Sprinkle turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, amchur powder, and salt. Cook: Fry on medium heat, stirring occasionally, until bhindi is cooked and slightly crispy. Serve: Serve hot as a side dish with roti or rice.

title: Tindora Fry
ingredients: Tindora (ivy gourd), Oil, Mustard seeds, Cumin seeds, Turmeric powder, Red chili powder, Coriander powder, Salt, Asafoetida (hing), Curry leaves (optional)
steps: Prepare tindora: Wash and dry tindora. Slice into thin rounds. Heat oil: Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds and cumin seeds; let them splutter. Add spices: Add a pinch of asafoetida and curry leaves if using. Cook tindora: Add sliced tindora and sauté for a minute. Add powdered spices: Sprinkle turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, and salt. Fry: Cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally, until tindora is tender and slightly crispy. Serve: Serve hot with roti or as a side dish.

title: Pumpkin Curry
ingredients: Pumpkin, Onion, Tomato, Green chili, Ginger, Garlic, Mustard seeds, Cumin seeds, Curry leaves, Turmeric powder, Red chili powder, Coriander powder, Garam masala, Salt, Oil, Fresh coriander leaves, Coconut milk (optional)
steps: Prepare pumpkin: Peel and cut pumpkin into cubes. Prepare tempering: Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and curry leaves. Let them splutter. Sauté aromatics: Add finely chopped onion, ginger, garlic, and green chili. Sauté until onion turns golden. Add tomato and spices: Add chopped tomato, turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, and salt. Cook until tomatoes are soft. Add pumpkin: Add pumpkin cubes and mix well. Cook: Add water or coconut milk (if using) to cover pumpkin. Cover and cook on medium heat until pumpkin is tender. Finish: Add garam masala and cook for another 2 minutes. Garnish: Garnish with fresh coriander leaves. Serve: Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Zucchini Stir Fry
ingredients: Zucchini, Garlic, Olive oil, Salt, Black pepper, Red chili flakes (optional), Lemon juice, Fresh parsley or coriander leaves
steps: Prepare zucchini: Wash and slice zucchini into thin rounds or half-moons. Heat oil: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic: Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. Add zucchini: Add sliced zucchini to the pan. Season: Sprinkle salt, black pepper, and red chili flakes if using. Cook: Stir fry zucchini until tender but still slightly crisp (about 5-7 minutes). Finish: Remove from heat, squeeze fresh lemon juice over it, and garnish with chopped parsley or coriander. Serve: Serve warm as a side dish.

title: Tofu Curry
ingredients: Firm tofu, Onion, Tomato, Garlic, Ginger, Green chili, Mustard seeds, Cumin seeds, Curry leaves, Turmeric powder, Red chili powder, Coriander powder, Garam masala, Salt, Oil, Fresh coriander leaves, Coconut milk (optional)
steps: Prepare tofu: Cut firm tofu into cubes and lightly fry until golden. Set aside. Prepare tempering: Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and curry leaves. Let them splutter. Sauté aromatics: Add finely chopped onion, garlic, ginger, and green chili. Sauté until onions turn golden. Add tomatoes and spices: Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric powder, red chili powder, coriander powder, salt. Cook until tomatoes soften and oil separates. Add tofu: Add fried tofu cubes and mix gently. Add coconut milk: Pour coconut milk if using, and simmer for 5-10 minutes to allow flavors to blend. Finish: Add garam masala and fresh coriander leaves. Mix well. Serve: Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Tofu Stir Fry
ingredients: Firm tofu, Bell peppers, Broccoli, Carrots, Snow peas, Garlic, Ginger, Soy sauce, Sesame oil, Olive oil, Green onions, Salt, Black pepper, Sesame seeds (optional)
steps: Prepare tofu: Cut firm tofu into cubes. Pat dry to remove moisture. Cook tofu: Heat olive oil in a pan. Fry tofu cubes until golden on all sides. Remove and set aside. Sauté aromatics: In the same pan, add sesame oil, minced garlic, and grated ginger. Sauté until fragrant. Add vegetables: Add chopped bell peppers, broccoli florets, carrots, and snow peas. Stir fry for 4-5 minutes until tender-crisp. Add tofu back: Return tofu cubes to the pan. Season: Add soy sauce, salt, and black pepper. Toss everything gently to combine. Finish: Garnish with chopped green onions and sesame seeds if using. Serve: Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Veg Sushi
ingredients: Sushi rice, Nori sheets, Cucumber, Carrot, Avocado, Bell pepper, Rice vinegar, Sugar, Salt, Soy sauce, Wasabi, Pickled ginger
steps: Prepare sushi rice: Rinse sushi rice until water runs clear. Cook rice and let it cool slightly. Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt, then fold into the cooked rice. Prepare vegetables: Julienne cucumber, carrot, bell pepper, and slice avocado. Assemble sushi: Place a nori sheet on a bamboo sushi mat. Spread an even layer of sushi rice over nori, leaving a small border. Add fillings: Place vegetable strips horizontally near one edge. Roll sushi: Using the mat, roll the sushi tightly from the edge with fillings. Slice: Cut the roll into bite-sized pieces with a sharp knife. Serve: Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

title: Chicken Sushi
ingredients: Sushi rice, Nori sheets, Cooked chicken breast (shredded or sliced), Cucumber, Avocado, Mayonnaise (optional), Rice vinegar, Sugar, Salt, Soy sauce, Wasabi, Pickled ginger
steps: Prepare sushi rice: Rinse sushi rice until water runs clear. Cook rice and let it cool slightly. Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt, then fold into the cooked rice. Prepare fillings: Slice cooked chicken breast, cucumber, and avocado into thin strips. Optionally mix chicken with a little mayonnaise for creaminess. Assemble sushi: Place a nori sheet on a bamboo sushi mat. Spread an even layer of sushi rice over nori, leaving a small border. Add fillings: Place chicken, cucumber, and avocado strips horizontally near one edge. Roll sushi: Using the mat, roll the sushi tightly from the edge with fillings. Slice: Cut the roll into bite-sized pieces with a sharp knife. Serve: Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

title: Beef Teriyaki
ingredients: Beef (thinly sliced), Soy sauce, Mirin, Sake (optional), Sugar, Garlic, Ginger, Vegetable oil, Green onions, Sesame seeds
steps: Prepare marinade: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sake (if using), sugar, minced garlic, and grated ginger in a bowl. Marinate beef: Add thinly sliced beef to the marinade. Let it marinate for at least 30 minutes. Cook beef: Heat vegetable oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add beef slices and cook until browned and cooked through. Add sauce: Pour remaining marinade into the pan and cook until sauce thickens and coats the beef. Garnish: Sprinkle chopped green onions and sesame seeds on top. Serve: Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Teriyaki Tofu
ingredients: Firm tofu, Soy sauce, Mirin, Sake (optional), Sugar, Garlic, Ginger, Vegetable oil, Green onions, Sesame seeds
steps: Prepare tofu: Press tofu to remove excess water, then cut into cubes or slices. Make marinade: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sake (optional), sugar, minced garlic, and grated ginger. Marinate tofu: Marinate tofu pieces for at least 15-30 minutes. Cook tofu: Heat vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Fry tofu until golden on all sides. Add sauce: Pour marinade into the pan and cook until it thickens and coats tofu well. Garnish: Sprinkle chopped green onions and sesame seeds. Serve: Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Ramen
ingredients: Ramen noodles, Chicken or vegetable broth, Soy sauce, Miso paste (optional), Garlic, Ginger, Green onions, Mushrooms, Soft-boiled eggs, Bok choy or spinach, Corn, Nori sheets, Sesame oil, Chili paste (optional)
steps: Prepare broth: In a pot, heat chicken or vegetable broth. Add minced garlic, grated ginger, soy sauce, and miso paste (if using). Simmer for 10-15 minutes. Cook noodles: Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Prepare toppings: Soft boil eggs, slice mushrooms, chop green onions, and prepare vegetables like bok choy or spinach. Assemble ramen: Place noodles in a bowl. Pour hot broth over noodles. Add toppings: Add soft-boiled eggs, mushrooms, corn, greens, chopped green onions, and nori strips. Finish: Drizzle with sesame oil and add chili paste if desired. Serve: Serve hot immediately.

title: Udon Noodles
ingredients: Udon noodles, Dashi stock (or vegetable broth), Soy sauce, Mirin, Sugar, Green onions, Shiitake mushrooms, Tofu or tempura (optional), Seaweed (nori), Sesame oil, Ginger
steps: Prepare broth: Heat dashi stock or vegetable broth in a pot. Add soy sauce, mirin, and a pinch of sugar. Simmer gently. Cook noodles: Cook udon noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. Prepare toppings: Slice shiitake mushrooms, chop green onions, and prepare tofu or tempura if using. Assemble bowl: Place cooked noodles in a bowl. Pour hot broth over the noodles. Add toppings: Add mushrooms, tofu or tempura, chopped green onions, and seaweed strips. Finish: Drizzle a little sesame oil and add fresh grated ginger if desired. Serve: Serve hot immediately.

title: Tempura
ingredients: Vegetables (sweet potato, bell pepper, zucchini, broccoli), Shrimp (optional), All-purpose flour, Cornstarch, Egg, Ice-cold water, Salt, Oil for deep frying, Soy sauce, Dashi, Mirin, Sugar (for dipping sauce)
steps: Prepare batter: Mix all-purpose flour, cornstarch, egg, and ice-cold water gently. Do not overmix; batter should be lumpy. Prepare ingredients: Cut vegetables into bite-sized pieces. If using shrimp, devein and peel, leaving tail. Heat oil: Heat oil to 180°C (350°F) for deep frying. Coat and fry: Dip vegetables and shrimp into batter, then carefully drop into hot oil. Fry until golden and crispy. Drain: Remove tempura with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels. Make dipping sauce: Mix soy sauce, dashi, mirin, and sugar. Heat gently to dissolve sugar. Serve: Serve tempura hot with dipping sauce.

title: Donburi
ingredients: Cooked rice, Chicken or beef slices, Onion, Soy sauce, Mirin, Sugar, Dashi or broth, Eggs, Green onions, Oil
steps: Prepare sauce: In a pan, combine soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and dashi or broth. Bring to a simmer. Cook meat and onion: Add sliced onion and meat to the pan. Cook until meat is tender and onion is soft. Add eggs: Beat eggs lightly and pour over the meat and onion mixture. Cover and cook until eggs are just set. Assemble: Place cooked rice in a bowl. Serve: Spoon the meat, onion, and egg mixture over rice. Garnish with chopped green onions.

title: Croissant
ingredients: All-purpose flour, Sugar, Salt, Active dry yeast, Warm milk, Unsalted butter (cold, for laminating), Eggs, Water
steps: Prepare dough: Mix flour, sugar, salt, and yeast. Add warm milk and mix into a dough. Knead dough: Knead until smooth and elastic. Let it rise until doubled in size. Prepare butter block: Flatten cold butter into a thin square. Laminate dough: Roll dough into a rectangle, place butter block on half, fold dough over butter, and roll out. Fold dough into thirds (like a letter). Chill dough. Repeat rolling and folding 3-4 times, chilling between folds. Shape croissants: Roll dough into a large rectangle. Cut triangles. Roll each triangle from base to tip to form croissants. Proof: Let croissants rise until puffy. Bake: Brush with egg wash and bake in a preheated oven at 200°C (400°F) for 15-20 minutes until golden.

title: Quiche
ingredients: Pie crust (store-bought or homemade), Eggs, Heavy cream or milk, Cheese (Gruyere, cheddar, or your choice), Cooked bacon or ham (optional), Spinach or vegetables (optional), Salt, Black pepper, Nutmeg
steps: Preheat oven: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Prepare crust: Roll out pie crust and fit into a tart or pie pan. Blind bake crust for about 10 minutes. Prepare filling: In a bowl, whisk eggs and cream. Add salt, pepper, and a pinch of nutmeg. Add fillings: Spread cheese, cooked bacon/ham, and vegetables evenly in the crust. Pour egg mixture: Pour the egg mixture over the fillings. Bake: Bake for 30-40 minutes until filling is set and golden on top. Cool and serve: Let cool slightly before slicing and serving.

title: French Onion Soup
ingredients: Onions, Butter, Olive oil, Beef broth, Dry white wine, Thyme, Bay leaf, Salt, Black pepper, Baguette slices, Gruyere cheese
steps: Caramelize onions: Slice onions thinly. Heat butter and olive oil in a pot. Add onions and cook slowly until deeply caramelized (about 30-40 minutes). Add broth and wine: Add beef broth, dry white wine, thyme, and bay leaf. Simmer for 20-30 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Prepare bread: Toast baguette slices until crisp. Assemble soup: Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls. Place toasted baguette slices on top. Add cheese: Sprinkle grated Gruyere cheese generously over bread. Broil: Place bowls under broiler until cheese is melted and bubbly. Serve: Serve hot.

title: Ratatouille
ingredients: Eggplant, Zucchini, Bell peppers, Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic, Olive oil, Thyme, Basil, Salt, Black pepper
steps: Prepare vegetables: Slice eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes into thin rounds. Chop onion and mince garlic. Cook base: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onion and garlic until soft. Layer vegetables: In a baking dish, arrange sliced vegetables in alternating layers (eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, tomato). Season: Drizzle olive oil over vegetables, sprinkle thyme, basil, salt, and pepper. Bake: Cover dish with foil and bake at 190°C (375°F) for about 45 minutes until vegetables are tender. Serve: Serve warm as a side or main dish.

title: Crepes
ingredients: All-purpose flour, Eggs, Milk, Water, Salt, Butter (melted), Sugar (optional for sweet crepes), Vanilla extract (optional)
steps: Make batter: In a bowl, whisk together flour, eggs, milk, water, salt, melted butter, and sugar/vanilla if using until smooth. Rest batter: Let the batter rest for about 30 minutes in the fridge. Heat pan: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and lightly grease it. Cook crepes: Pour a small ladle of batter into the pan, tilt to spread evenly. Cook until edges lift and bottom is golden, then flip and cook the other side briefly. Serve: Serve warm with fillings like fruits, Nutella, jam, or savory fillings as desired.

title: Baguette
ingredients: All-purpose flour, Water, Active dry yeast, Salt, Sugar (optional)
steps: Prepare dough: Mix flour, yeast, salt, and sugar (if using). Add water gradually and mix until a dough forms. Knead dough: Knead for about 10 minutes until smooth and elastic. First rise: Place dough in a bowl, cover, and let rise until doubled in size (1-2 hours). Shape baguettes: Punch down dough, divide into portions, shape into long thin loaves. Second rise: Place shaped dough on a baking tray, cover, and let rise again for 30-45 minutes. Preheat oven: Preheat oven to 220°C (430°F). Place a pan of water in oven to create steam. Bake: Make slashes on top of loaves with a sharp knife. Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown and crusty. Cool: Let cool on a wire rack before slicing.

title: Tacos
ingredients: Taco shells or soft tortillas, Ground beef or chicken, Onion, Garlic, Taco seasoning, Tomato, Lettuce, Cheddar cheese, Sour cream, Salsa, Olive oil, Cilantro, Lime
steps: Cook meat: Heat olive oil in a pan. Sauté chopped onion and garlic until soft. Add ground meat and cook until browned. Add seasoning: Stir in taco seasoning and a little water. Simmer until meat is well coated and cooked through. Prepare toppings: Chop tomato, lettuce, and cilantro. Grate cheddar cheese. Warm shells: Heat taco shells or tortillas as per package instructions. Assemble tacos: Fill shells with cooked meat, then add toppings like tomato, lettuce, cheese, sour cream, salsa, and cilantro. Serve: Serve with lime wedges.

title: Nachos
ingredients: Tortilla chips, Cheddar cheese (shredded), Jalapeños, Black beans, Corn, Tomato, Onion, Cilantro, Sour cream, Guacamole, Salsa
steps: Preheat oven: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Layer chips: Spread tortilla chips evenly on a baking sheet or oven-safe dish. Add toppings: Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese over chips. Add jalapeños, black beans, corn, diced tomato, and chopped onion. Bake: Bake in oven for 10-15 minutes until cheese melts and toppings are heated. Add fresh toppings: Remove from oven and top with fresh cilantro, sour cream, guacamole, and salsa. Serve: Serve immediately while hot.

title: Burrito
ingredients: Large flour tortillas, Cooked rice, Black beans, Ground beef or chicken, Onion, Garlic, Taco seasoning, Cheese, Lettuce, Tomato, Sour cream, Salsa, Cilantro, Olive oil
steps: Cook meat: Heat olive oil in a pan. Sauté chopped onion and garlic until soft. Add ground meat and cook until browned. Add seasoning: Stir in taco seasoning and cook for a few minutes. Prepare fillings: Warm black beans and cooked rice. Chop lettuce, tomato, and cilantro. Assemble burrito: Lay a tortilla flat. Add rice, beans, meat, cheese, lettuce, tomato, sour cream, salsa, and cilantro. Roll burrito: Fold in sides and roll tightly from one end to the other. Serve: Serve immediately or grill briefly to seal and warm.

title: Quesadilla
ingredients: Flour tortillas, Shredded cheese (cheddar, mozzarella, or a mix), Cooked chicken or beef (optional), Bell peppers, Onions, Olive oil, Salsa, Sour cream, Guacamole
steps: Prepare fillings: Slice bell peppers and onions. Cook with a bit of olive oil until soft if using. Heat pan: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Assemble quesadilla: Place a tortilla in the pan, sprinkle cheese evenly, add cooked meat and vegetables (if using), then top with more cheese and another tortilla. Cook: Cook until bottom tortilla is golden and cheese melts, then carefully flip and cook the other side. Serve: Remove from pan, cut into wedges. Serve with salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.

title: Enchiladas
ingredients: Corn tortillas, Cooked shredded chicken or beef, Enchilada sauce, Shredded cheese (cheddar or Mexican blend), Onion, Garlic, Olive oil, Cilantro, Sour cream, Jalapeños (optional)
steps: Preheat oven: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Prepare filling: In a pan, sauté chopped onion and garlic in olive oil. Add cooked shredded chicken or beef and some enchilada sauce. Mix well. Assemble enchiladas: Dip each tortilla in enchilada sauce, fill with meat mixture, roll tightly, and place seam side down in a baking dish. Add sauce and cheese: Pour remaining enchilada sauce over rolled tortillas. Sprinkle shredded cheese on top. Bake: Bake for 20-25 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly. Serve: Garnish with chopped cilantro, sour cream, and jalapeños if desired.
